name: Weapon Levitation & The Empire's Back
Text: 'USED: Cancel Disarmed or Wookie Strangle. OR Once per battle involving Vader, reveal a device or character weapon from Used Pile and add its printed destiny number to your total power; reshuffle.LOST: Use 1 Force to deploy (or retrieve) Vader from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR If opponent just initiated a battle against Vader defending alone at a site, his forfeit cannot be reduced.',
